attributes.additional_details: This E Petition is for the Government to introduce a new ban which would ban Actors and Actresses from drinking alcohol while filming scenes. A the moment the government to complaining that we should reduce or stop drinking alcohol, while knowing the Actors and Actresses are drinking while filming e.g Eastenders and Emmerdale. We can't be told to stop doing something which the TV shows are contradicting what the government is saying no to do.
